TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnmanagedMemoryAccessor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: Proporciona acceso aleatorio a bloques de memoria no administrada desde código administrado.

span.span: Provides random access to unmanaged blocks of memory from managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método de un object devuelve los bloques de memoria para trabajar con vistas de archivos asignados a memoria no administrada.The method of a object returns the unmanaged blocks of memory for working with views of memory-mapped files. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)]

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: Libera todos los recursos que usa .

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: Es para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Libera los recursos no administrados que usa y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método se llama por el público `Dispose()` método y el método.This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` invoca el protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro establecido en `true`.`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. invoca `Dispose` con `disposing` establecido en `false`. invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. Cuando el `disposing` parámetro es true, este método libera todos los recursos mantenidos por los objetos administrados que este referencias.When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. Este método invoca al método `Dispose()` de cada uno de los objetos a los que se hace referencia.This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: puede recibir varias llamadas de otros objetos.

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: Cuando se reemplaza tenga cuidado de no hacer referencia a objetos que se hayan eliminado en una llamada anterior a .

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: Para obtener más información sobre cómo implementar , consulte [implementar un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: Para obtener más información acerca de y , consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Utilice este método para leer estructuras medianas o grandes que no son dificultad por los otros métodos de lectura de esta clase.Use this method to read medium to large structures that are not easily accommodated by the other read methods in this class.

span.span: The accessor does not support reading.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

span.span: This value can be less than if there are fewer structures available, or zero if the end of the accessor is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use este método para escribir estructuras medianas y grandes que no son dificultad otros métodos de esta clase.Use this method to write medium to large structures that are not easily accommodated by the other methods in this class.
